ValidationRule.description: Score must be a whole number from 0-10
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( NOT($Profile.Id="00e30000000bvR3"), PjM_Objective_Fulfilment_Score__c!=0, PjM_Objective_Fulfilment_Score__c!=1, PjM_Objective_Fulfilment_Score__c!=2, PjM_Objective_Fulfilment_Score__c!=3, PjM_Objective_Fulfilment_Score__c!=4, PjM_Objective_Fulfilment_Score__c!=5, PjM_Objective_Fulfilment_Score__c!=6, PjM_Objective_Fulfilment_Score__c!=7, PjM_Objective_Fulfilment_Score__c!=8, PjM_Objective_Fulfilment_Score__c!=9, PjM_Objective_Fulfilment_Score__c!=10 )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Scores must be a whole number between 0 and 10.
